section.title: Configuring component.
section.para: Well, it is almost the final step in the component creation process - component configuration.

There is inputDate.xml file in the src/main/config/component directory that is used by CDK factory for generating not only the complete UIInputDate class, but also a TLD file, a tag handler and a descriptor for JSP and Facelets.
Please, open the inputDate.xml in your favorite text editor and take a look at the skeleton.
